Texts.Chs:
可爱的杂食的几乎绝缘的的太空啮齿动物。它们在星空中游荡，寻求刺激，对于啮齿动物来说，它们勇气过人。他们聪明可靠，赢得了商人的声誉。

  ^orange;食性^reset;: 杂食性

^orange;天赋^reset;:
  +^green;10^reset;% 速度 & 跳跃高度
  ^green;抗性^reset;: +^green;50^reset;% 电气抗性, 坠落上海 x^green;0.8^reset;
  熟练商贾: +^green;21^reset;% 魅力, +500 初始资金
  +^green;72^reset; 饱腹上限

^orange;武器^reset;:
  打击者: +^green;1^reset;% 暴击几率, +^green;5^reset; 暴击伤害
  镰刀: 防御 x^green;1.15^reset;

^red;弱点^reset;:
  HP x^red;0.9^reset;
  ^red;抗性^reset;: -^red;20^reset;% 辐射抗性, -^red;25^reset;%毒素抗性, -^red;20^reset;% 射线抗性
Texts.Eng:
Adorable, omnivorous and nearly electric-proof space rodents. They prowl the stars seeking excitement, and are abnormally brave for rodents. Trustworthy and wise, they've earned a reputation as traders.

  ^orange;Diet^reset;: Omnivore

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  +^green;10^reset;% Speed & Jump
  ^green;Resist^reset;: +^green;50^reset;% Electric, Fall Damage x^green;0.8^reset;
  Great Traders: +^green;21^reset;% Charisma, +500 Start Cash
  +^green;72^reset; Max Food

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  Striker: +^green;1^reset;% Crit, +^green;5^reset; Crit Damage
  Scythe: Defense x^green;1.15^reset;

^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
  Health x^red;0.9^reset;
  ^red;Resist^reset;: -^red;20^reset;% Radioactive, -^red;25^reset;%Poison, -^red;20^reset;% Cosmic
